Articles.Content:
I have a design idea I would like to have made (on the topic of KSP) however I am not good at ALL with computer art with no experience whatsoever. I would like to have this request done relatively soon (on a deadline) therefore ruling me learning to do this myself out. 

It's not a hard request- but if you could contact me via PM I can provide you with more details on what I want ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) . There **IS** a potential reward for whoever is willing to do this!! 

Thank you so much for considering this and please contact me if you feel like trying here or preferably in a PM.

> 
> Noted and responded.

im good at art

> 
> im good at art

Little better than what you probably could do ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) - no offense. I'm looking potentially almost to the level of "professional".

> 
> Little better than what you probably could do ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) - no offense. I'm looking potentially almost to the level of "professional".

Well, don't judge until you've seen something of his. Unless you already have.
Okay, I just sent a PM. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Well, don't judge until you've seen something of his. Unless you already have.

I know him well enough ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) . I don't say "no" because I don't want to see his- I say "no" since I already know what he can do (not that I have a problem with it- I commend his desire to try!!).

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Okay, I just sent a PM. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Noted and responded.
